english.segment1: My Saviour, Redeemer. My love and my Lord. I'll give You all of my heart. My will and my soul. You take me as I am. A scarred and broken man. Lord, I surrender all I have to You. To You
english.segment2: Refrain: I will give you everything. I will, I will. Make my life an offering. I will, I will
english.segment3: My Saviour, I'll never. Forget what You've done. You carried the weight of my sin. To the cross, the victory's won!. You make my heart brand new. Now there's nothing I won't do. Lord, I surrender all I am to You, to You
english.segment4: So when I lose my life, I save it, I save it. And by Your Grace I'm saved. I know, I know it. And when You were on the cross. You gave it, You gave it all. Oh, yes You did. You gave it all
english.segment6: I will give my heart to You. I will, I will. Broken and poured out for You. I will, I will
english.segment7: No price I pay. Will ever be too great for me
english.segment8: To rest alone in the love You've shown. I'm free, I'm free
english.segment9: You took the stripes. You took the pain for me
english.segment10: So now I sing a song of hope. I'm free, I'm free
english.segment11: So now I sing Hallelujah. I'm free, I'm free.
